thread.title: How does Silicon Valley compete? It opens its doors to immigrants
thread.title_full: How does Silicon Valley compete? It opens its doors to immigrants - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Thomas Lee
title: How does Silicon Valley compete? It opens its doors to immigrants
text:
Photo: Paul Chinn, The Chronicle LinkedIn executive chairman and co-founder Reid Hoffman speaks with CNBC's Julia Boorstin during a fireside chat at the Internet Association's Virtuous Circle conference in Menlo Park, Calif. on Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015. LinkedIn executive chairman and co-founder Reid Hoffman speaks with...
Europeans have long admired Silicon Valley — everything from its venture capital model to its risk-taking culture. LinkedIn executive chairman and co-founder Reid Hoffman speaks with CNBC's Julia Boorstin during a fireside chat at the Internet Association's Virtuous Circle conference in Menlo Park, Calif. on Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015.
